sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Navbar, Nav, Container, Badge } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; // Import useAuth hook import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; // Import useCart hook function NavigationBar() { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); // Get user data from context const { cart } = useCart(); // Get cart data from context return ( Perfume Shop
Home About Contact {/* Show user's name if logged in */} {user ? ( <> Welcome, {user.name} Logout ) : ( <> Login Register )} {/* Cart Icon with Item Count */} Cart {cart && cart.length > 0 && ( {cart.length} )}
); } export default NavigationBar;
